reviewtext: I like these little headphones! They're lightweight and the sound they put out is quite substantial.  Not super-high end audio-snob substantial, but good enough to watch an action movie or edit some footage without costing an arm and a leg. I like the feeling of not having to baby them. So far they've held up, but if I do break them, I'm not too worried. $6.44 and I'm back in business 2 days later.  5/5 would recommend.
